RC2 The Rivest Cipher 2 provider supports keys ranging from 40 to 128 bits, default is 128 bits. Rijndael The Rijndael (also known as AES) provider supports keys of 128, 192, or 256 bits with a default of 256 bits. TripleDES The TripleDES provider (also known as 3DES) supports keys of 128 or 192 bits with a default of 192 bits.
